{{Flavour|A small, powerless larva of a killer bee.}}

==Useful Info==
'''Killer bee larva''' were immature [[killer bee]]s, too young and undeveloped to pose any serious threat. However, if they happened to cross a tile containing a [[honeycomb]] or [[royal jelly (item)|royal jelly]], they immediately matured into a mature killer bee. They could be found most often in killer bee [[vault]]s, and were occasionally seen elsewhere as a possible [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifter]] form.

==Tips & Tricks==
None required.

==History==
Killer bee larvae were removed from ''Crawl'' in [[0.11]].
